code:
stateDiagram-v2
    [FinTech_TransactionQueue] --> Idle
    Idle --> Recall: query
    Recall --> Found: match
    Recall --> NotFound: miss
    Found --> Apply
    Apply --> Validate
    Validate --> Strengthen: success
    Validate --> Weaken: fail
    NotFound --> Solve
    Solve --> Capture
    Capture --> Idle
    Strengthen --> Idle
    Weaken --> Idle
